markdown:
**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 204
  • Change the [human](/Traits.aspx?ID=90) trait to [dwarf](/Traits.aspx?ID=54).
  • Add [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3) to the NPC's languages.
  • Add [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
  • Decrease the NPC's Speed by 5 feet. If the NPC already has a reduced Speed due their armor, consider applying the [Unburdened Iron](/Feats.aspx?ID=5) ancestry feat.
name: Dwarf
